(Simplified: 锑)
Chinese Definition:
①一種金屬元素，應用於化工、電工和醫藥上，它的合金可制鉛字、軸承等。

銻字的基本解释

銻
tī
见“锑”。

銻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tí］
［《廣韻》杜奚切，平齊，定。］
“锑1”的繁体字。
(1)见“鎕銻”。
(2)通“蒂”。筑土的杵。
[②]［tī］
“锑2”的繁体字。
金属元素。符号Sb。银白色，有光泽，易碎成粉末，有冷胀性。广泛应用在化学工业、电子工业和医药上。锑的合金多用来制造铅字、轴承等。

銻字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　銻； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1306第13
〔古文〕厗【唐韻】杜兮切【集韻】【韻會】田黎切，?音題。【說文】鎕銻，火齊珠名。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tí］
["Guangyun" Du Xiqie, level and set. ]
Traditional characters for "Antimony 1".
(1) See "Neptunium Antimony".
(2) Through "Tie". A pestle for building soil.
[②]［tī］
Traditional characters for "Antimony 2".
metal element. Symbol Sb. Silvery white, shiny, easily broken into powder, with cold expansion. It is widely used in the chemical industry, electronics industry and medicine. Antimony alloys are mostly used to make type, bearings, etc.
antimony

[Ancient text] Ao [Tang Yun] Du Xiqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Tian Liqie,? Sound title. [Speaking text] Neptunium and antimony, the name of the fire qizhu.
